DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine specific contribution energy intake energy expenditure change body weight fat .
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Changes body weight fat positively associate increase total energy intake . 2 . Changes body weight fat positively associate decrease total energy expenditure .
DOC.criteria: BMI : 2035 *Note : For participant come Orientation , allow participant variance 0.1 either way BMI range : 19.9 35.1 2135 year age Men woman Email address Access phone Currently medication lose weight > 90th percentile Brief Symptom Inventory ( BSI ) Planning move Greater Columbia area next 15 month Other medical , psychiatric behavioral factor judgment principal investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol . Changed birth control status past 3 month Currently take birth control plan stop take within next 12 month plan start take birth control next 12 month Planning weight loss surgery Started stop smoke past 6 month Blood pressure ≥ 150/90 Blood glucose ≥ 145 mg/dL @ orientation Blood glucose ≥ 126 mg/dL @ B3 Total cholesterol ≥ 240 mg/dl LDLC ≥ 190 mg/dl Triglyceride level ≥ 300 mg/dL Currently diagnose take medication major chronic health condition Presence eat disorder Currently participate another study
